text: I am very dumb and had it like this  `{% if module.module1 == 'value_i_want' or if module.module2 == 'other_value_i_want' %}`

Hey guys, Im currently having issues with my blog listing page displaying the title of the post. I am using a template that I cloned and edited, so I checked the original copy to see if the issue was happening there as well and it was. Any advice/suggestions?
